text: Nicholas Smith (5 March 1934 - 6 December 2015) was an English actor. He was best known for playing the bald and jug-eared manager, Mr Rumbold, in the BBC sitcom Are You Being Served?. Smith is the last surviving member of the original cast of Are You Being Served?. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls Category:Actors from Surrey Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors
title: Nicholas Smith (actor)
